00027         public static String getHtmlCode(GridViewerData gridEntity)
00028         {
00029                 String html = "";
00030 
00031                 // TODO: modifier les class de style et mettre du style css a la place
00032                 // un moment donnée
00033 
00034                 String pageSelectorHtml = null;
00035                 String searchBarHtml = null;
00036 
00037                 if (gridEntity instanceof ListViewerData)
00038                 {
00039                         if (((ListViewerData) (gridEntity)).getSearchBar() != null)
00040                         {
00041                                 searchBarHtml = SearchBarViewer
00042                                                 .getHtmlCode(((ListViewerData) (gridEntity))
00043                                                                 .getSearchBar());
00044                                 html += searchBarHtml;
00045                         }
00046 
00047                         if (((ListViewerData) (gridEntity)).getPageSelector() != null)
00048                         {
00049                                 pageSelectorHtml = PageSelectorViewer
00050                                                 .getHtmlCode(((ListViewerData) (gridEntity))
00051                                                                 .getPageSelector());
00052                                 html += pageSelectorHtml;
00053                         }
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 html += "<table class='ListViewerTable' border='0' cellpadding='3' cellspacing='0'>";
00057                 html += getTableHeader(gridEntity.getHeader(), gridEntity
00058                                 .getLeftHeader().length > 0);
00059                 html += getDataRowList(gridEntity);
00060 
00061                 html += "</table>";
00062 
00063                 if (pageSelectorHtml != null)
00064                         html += pageSelectorHtml;
00065 
00066                 return html;
00067         }

00069         private static String getTableHeader(GridCaseData[] headerCase,
00070                         boolean hasLeftHeader)
00071         {
00072 
00073                 String html = "";
00074                 // todo: change by th in css
00075                 String isHeader = " class='ListViewerTableHeader'";
00076                 int k = 0;
00077                 String colspan;
00078                 html += "\n<tr>";
00079                 if (hasLeftHeader)
00080                         html += "<th></th>";
00081                 for (int i = 0; i < headerCase.length; i++)
00082                 {
00083                         colspan = "";
00084                         if (headerCase[i] != null)
00085                         {
00086                                 for (k = i; k < headerCase.length
00087                                                 && headerCase[i].equals(headerCase[k]); k++)
00088                                 {
00089                                         if (k != i)
00090                                                 headerCase[k] = null;
00091                                 }
00092                                 if (k - i > 1)
00093                                         colspan = " colspan='" + (k - i) + "'";
00094 
00095                                 html += "<th" + isHeader + colspan + ">"
00096                                                 + getCase(headerCase[i]) + "</th>";
00097                         }
00098                 }
00099                 html += "</tr>";
00100                 return html;
00101         }

00103         private static String getDataRowList(GridViewerData gridData)
00104 
00105         {
00106                 GridCaseData[][] data = gridData.getCases();
00107                 GridCaseData[] leftHeader = gridData.getLeftHeader();
00108                 String caseContent;
00109                 StringBuilder html = new StringBuilder(); // optimisation du string
00110                 // append
00111 
00112                 for (int i = 0; i < data.length; i++)
00113                 {
00114                         html.append("\n<tr>");
00115                         if (i < leftHeader.length)
00116                                 html.append("<th>" + getCase(leftHeader[i]) + "</th>");
00117 
00118                         for (int j = 0; j < data[i].length; j++)
00119                         {
00120                                 int k = 0;
00121                                 String rowspan = "";
00122                                 String color = "";
00123                                 String moneyStyleModifier = "";
00124                                 if (data[i][j] != null)
00125                                 {
00126                                         if (i == 0 || (i > 0 && !data[i][j].equals(data[i - 1][j]))
00127                                                         || !gridData.isSpanSimilar())
00128                                         {
00129                                                 for (k = i; k < data.length
00130                                                                 && data[i][j].equals(data[k][j])
00131                                                                 && gridData.isSpanSimilar(); k++)
00132                                                 {
00133                                                         // nothing to do...
00134                                                 }
00135                                                 if (k - i > 1)
00136                                                         rowspan = " rowspan='" + (k - i) + "'";
00137 
00138                                                 caseContent = getCase(data[i][j]);
00139 
00140                                                 if (caseContent.endsWith("$"))
00141                                                         moneyStyleModifier = " moneyStyleModifier";
00142 
00143                                                 if (gridData.isColored() || data[i][j].isColored())
00144                                                         color = " background-color:"
00145                                                                         + ColorViewer.getColor(caseContent) + ";";
00146 
00147                                                 html.append("<td class='gridCell" + moneyStyleModifier
00148                                                                 + "' " + rowspan + "style='" + color
00149                                                                 + "text-align:center;'>" + caseContent
00150                                                                 + "</td>");
00151                                         }
00152                                 }
00153                                 else
00154                                         html.append("<td></td>");
00155                         }
00156                         if (gridData instanceof ListViewerData)
00157                                 html.append(getSpecificButton(gridData
00158                                                 .getSpecificActionButtonList(),
00159                                                 ((ListViewerData) gridData).getEntity().get(i)));
00160                         else
00161                                 html.append(getSpecificButton(gridData
00162                                                 .getSpecificActionButtonList(), null));
00163 
00164                         html.append("</tr>");
00165                 }
00166 
00167                 return html.toString();
00168         }

00170         private static String getSpecificButton(Vector<ActionLink> actionLinks,
00171                         AbstractEntity entity)
00172         {
00173                 String html = "";
00174 
00175                 for (ActionLink action : actionLinks)
00176                 {
00177                         html += "<td>";
00178 
00179                         html += ButtonLinkViewer.getHtmlCode(action, entity);
00180 
00181                         html += "</td>";
00182                 }
00183 
00184                 return html;
00185 
00186         }

00188         private static String getCase(GridCaseData dtCase)
00189         {
00190                 String html = "";
00191                 if (dtCase != null)
00192                 {
00193                         if (dtCase.getAction() != null)
00194                                 html += "<a href='" + dtCase.getUrlParam() + "'>";
00195                         html += dtCase.getName();
00196                         if (dtCase.getAction() != null)
00197                                 html += "</a>";
00198                 }
00199                 return html;
00200         }
